body:
Hi Avicus, 
  I sent an email regarding my appeal, I have never done this before so I was wondering, about how long does it take to get ur ban appealed? Thanx guyz

~Matt
body_tagged:
Hi Avicus, 
  I sent an email regarding my appeal, I have never done this before so I was wondering, about how long does it take to get ur ban appealed? Thanx guyz

~Matt
title: Ban Appeal

replies.body:
1 - 2 weeks kthnxbai

(It says 48 hours :P but das not tru)
replies.body_tagged:
1 - 2 weeks kthnxbai

(It says 48 hours :P but das not tru)

replies.body: It is usually around a week. It can take a bit longer/shorter.
replies.body_tagged: It is usually around a week. It can take a bit longer/shorter.

replies.body: Actually my last 2 bans were answered in a day, so it might take you a day, weeks or months.
replies.body_tagged: Actually my last 2 bans were answered in a day, so it might take you a day, weeks or months.

replies.body: When I appealed my ban it took me 2 weeks so I resent and I got a reply within an hour! Hope this helps!
replies.body_tagged: When I appealed my ban it took me 2 weeks so I resent and I got a reply within an hour! Hope this helps!

replies.body: We try and respond to all e-mails within a day or two.
replies.body_tagged: We try and respond to all e-mails within a day or two.

replies.body: YES!!!! I was unbanned! Cant wait to go back on the server!
replies.body_tagged: YES!!!! I was unbanned! Cant wait to go back on the server!

replies.body:
Can we not make the 17 years jokes? Seriously, they're overused and rude.

We try to get e-mails responded to as quickly as we can, it could take a few days though.
replies.body_tagged:
Can we not make the 17 years jokes? Seriously, they're overused and rude.

We try to get e-mails responded to as quickly as we can, it could take a few days though.

replies.body: Glad everything worked out :)  Hope to see you in game
replies.body_tagged: Glad everything worked out :)  Hope to see you in game

replies.body:
Since the question has been answered and this post seems to become a road of spam about 17 years and false times, I'll be locking this post. 
Good job for the un-ban though :D
